name: Yet Another Sniper vs. Spy (YASvS)
description:
Yet Another Sniper vs. Spy (YASvS) is a multiplayer game to play with your friends when you are bored, while spy tries to steal and run away it's Sniper's job to locate and shoot him, you can make a point system, you can switch roles each round! Do whatever you want. I just Made this game so you could have fun! Enjoy. 

You can join my discord server too! https://discord.gg/kXEmT27
